Ajani Goldmane.name: Ajani Goldmane
Ajani Goldmane.text:
[+1]: You gain 2 life.
[−1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
[−6]: Create a white Avatar creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."
Ajani Goldmane.original_text:
+1: You gain 2 life.
-1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
-6: Put a white Avatar creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

rulings.text: The vigilance granted to a creature by the second ability remains until the end of the turn even if the +1/+1 counter is removed.
The power and toughness of the Avatar created by the third ability will change as your life total changes.

-6: Bringe einen weißen Avatar-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel. Er hat „Stärke und Widerstandskraft dieser Kreatur sind gleich deinem Lebenspunktestand".

Ajani's Pridemate.name: Ajani's Pridemate
Ajani's Pridemate.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.
Ajani's Pridemate.flavor:
"When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."
—Jazal Goldmane
Ajani's Pridemate.original_text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate. (For example, if an effect causes you to gain 3 life, you may put one +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

rulings.text: The ability of Ajani’s Pridemate triggers just once for each life-gaining event, whether it’s 1 life from Paradise Plume or 2 life from Mycologist.
If Ajani’s Pridemate is dealt lethal damage at the same time that you gain life, it won’t receive a counter from its ability in time to save it.

Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, Ajani’s Pridemate’s ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
If you gain an amount of life “for each” of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability of Ajani’s Pridemate triggers only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won’t cause the ability to trigger, even though it caused your team’s life total to increase.

Angelic Arbiter.name: Angelic Arbiter
Angelic Arbiter.text:
Flying
Each opponent who cast a spell this turn can't attack with creatures.
Each opponent who attacked with a creature this turn can't cast spells.
Angelic Arbiter.original_text:
Flying
Each opponent who cast a spell this turn can't attack with creatures.
Each opponent who attacked with a creature this turn can't cast spells.

rulings.text: During your turn, Angelic Arbiter’s abilities have no effect on the game.

During an opponent’s turn, that opponent may either cast spells or attack with creatures, but not both (assuming that Angelic Arbiter is on the battlefield for the entirety of that turn). The player may perform other actions, such as activating abilities and playing lands.

If Angelic Arbiter leaves the battlefield during an opponent’s turn, its abilities cease to affect the game. For example, if an opponent casts Doom Blade to destroy Angelic Arbiter, that player may then attack with creatures.

If Angelic Arbiter enters the battlefield during an opponent’s turn, its abilities take actions that player performed earlier in the turn into account, even though it wasn’t on the battlefield at the time. For example, if an opponent casts a spell, then you use Leyline of Anticipation’s ability to cast Angelic Arbiter as though it had flash, that player won’t be able to attack with creatures that turn.
Angelic Arbiter’s last ability applies if an opponent attacked with at least one creature during the current turn.

Armored Ascension.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.
Armored Ascension.flavor: With skill and strength honed upon the prairie, Naxtil won his battles high above it.
Armored Ascension.original_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.

rulings.text: This ability counts the number of Plains controlled by Armored Ascension’s controller, not the enchanted creature’s controller (in case they’re different players).
This bonus is not fixed; it changes as the number of Plains you control changes.
The ability cares about lands with the land type Plains, not necessarily lands named Plains.

Baneslayer Angel.flavor: Some angels protect the meek and innocent. Others seek out and smite evil wherever it lurks.
Baneslayer Angel.original_text: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons

rulings.text: “Protection from Demons and from Dragons” means the following: -- Baneslayer Angel can't be blocked by creatures with the creature type Demon or the creature type Dragon. -- Baneslayer Angel can't be targeted abilities from sources with the creature type Demon or the creature type Dragon, or by spells with either of those types. -- All damage that would be dealt to Baneslayer Angel by sources with the creature type Demon or the creature type Dragon is prevented. -- Baneslayer Angel can't be enchanted by Auras or equipped by artifacts that have somehow gotten the creature type Demon or the creature type Dragon.

foreign_names.name: Bannender Engel
foreign_names.text: Fliegend, Erstschlag, Lebensverknüpfung, Schutz vor Dämonen, Schutz vor Drachen
foreign_names.flavor: Einige Engel beschützen die Schwachen und Unschuldigen. Andere stöbern das Böse auf und erschlagen es.

foreign_names.name: Ángel matademonios
foreign_names.text: Vuela, daña primero, vínculo vital, protección contra Demonios y contra Dragones.
foreign_names.flavor: Algunos ángeles protegen a los débiles e inocentes. Otros buscan y destruyen al mal donde sea que se esconda.

foreign_names.name: Ange pourfendeur
foreign_names.text: Vol, initiative, lien de vie, protection contre les démons et protection contre les dragons
foreign_names.flavor: Certains anges protègent les faibles et les innocents. D'autres traquent sans cesse le mal dans ses tanières pour le pourfendre.

foreign_names.name: Angelo Flagellatore
foreign_names.text: Volare, attacco improvviso, legame vitale, protezione da Demoni e da Draghi
foreign_names.flavor: Alcuni angeli proteggono gli umili e gli innocenti. Altri scovano e puniscono il male ovunque si annidi.

foreign_names.name: 悪斬の天使
foreign_names.text: 飛行、先制攻撃、絆魂、プロテクション（デーモン）、プロテクション（ドラゴン）
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 天使
foreign_names.flavor: 弱く罪無き者を守る天使もいる。 あるいは、潜む邪悪を探し滅する天使もいる。

foreign_names.name: Anjo Exterminador do Mal
foreign_names.text: Voar, iniciativa, vínculo com a vida, proteção contra demônios e dragões
foreign_names.flavor: Alguns anjos protegem os fracos e inocentes. Outros perseguem e destroem o mal onde quer que se esconda.

foreign_names.name: Ангел, Истребитель Зла
foreign_names.text: Полет, Первый удар, Цепь жизни, Защита от Демонов и от Драконов
foreign_names.flavor: Одни ангелы защищают смиренных и невинных. Другие же преследуют и карают зло, где бы оно ни притаилось.

foreign_names.name: 破邪天使
foreign_names.text: 飞行，先攻，系命，反恶魔保护，反龙保护
foreign_names.flavor: 有些天使负责保护弱小与无辜者。 其他的则征伐邪恶潜藏处。

foreign_names.name: 破邪天使
foreign_names.text: 飛行，先攻，繫命，反惡魔保護，反龍保護
foreign_names.flavor: 有些天使負責保護弱小與無辜者。 其他的則征伐邪惡潛藏處。

Blinding Mage.name: Blinding Mage
Blinding Mage.flavor: "I carry the light of truth. Do not pity those it blinds, for they never had eyes to see."

foreign_names.name: Blendender Magier
foreign_names.text: {W}, {T}: Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreign_names.flavor: „Ich trage das Licht der Wahrheit mit mir. Wer davon geblendet wird, konnte ohnehin nie wirklich sehen."

foreign_names.name: Mago cegador
foreign_names.text: {W}, {T}: Gira la criatura objetivo.
foreign_names.flavor: "Llevo la luz de la verdad. No tengas lástima de aquellos a quienes ciega, porque nunca tuvieron ojos para ver."

foreign_names.name: Mage aveuglant
foreign_names.text: {W}, {T} : Engagez la créature ciblée.
foreign_names.flavor: « Je détiens la lumière de la vérité. Ne plaignez pas ceux qu'elle aveugle, car leurs yeux ne leur servaient pas pour voir. »

foreign_names.name: Mago Accecante
foreign_names.text: {W}, {T}: TAPpa una creatura bersaglio.
foreign_names.flavor: "Porto la luce della verità. Non compatite quelli che acceca, poiché non hanno mai avuto occhi per vederla."

foreign_names.name: 目潰しの魔道士
foreign_names.text: {W}, {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード
foreign_names.flavor: 「私がもたらすのは真実の光だ。 それに盲いらされた者を哀れんではいけない。彼らには元々見る目など無かったのだ。」

foreign_names.name: Mago Cegador
foreign_names.text: {W}, {T}: Vire a criatura alvo.
foreign_names.flavor: "Eu trago a luz da verdade. Não tenha piedade daqueles a quem ela cega, pois eles nunca tiveram olhos para ver."

foreign_names.name: Ослепляющий Маг
foreign_names.text: {W}, {T}: поверните целевое существо.
foreign_names.flavor: «Я несу свет правды. Не жалей тех, кого он ослепляет, ибо у них никогда не было глаз, чтобы узреть».

foreign_names.name: 眩目法师
foreign_names.text: {W}，{T}：横置目标生物。
foreign_names.flavor: 「真理光芒与我同行。 毋须同情因其盲目者，因为他们的眼睛本就看不到。」

foreign_names.name: 眩目法師
foreign_names.text: {W}，{T}：橫置目標生物。
foreign_names.flavor: 「真理光芒與我同行。 毋須同情因其盲目者，因為他們的眼睛本就看不到。」

Celestial Purge.name: Celestial Purge
Celestial Purge.text: Exile target black or red permanent.
Celestial Purge.flavor:
"They say only the good die young. Obviously, you are one of the exceptions."
—Delrobah, cleric of Ivora Gate
Celestial Purge.original_text: Exile target black or red permanent.

rulings.text: Lands are colorless (even if their frames have some colored elements to them). You can’t target a Swamp, a Mountain, or any other land with Celestial Purge (unless some other effect has turned that land black or red).

foreign_names.name: Himmlische Säuberung
foreign_names.text: Schicke eine schwarze oder rote bleibende Karte deiner Wahl ins Exil.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Es heißt, dass nur die Besten jung sterben. Anscheinend bist du da eine Ausnahme."
—Delrobah, Klerikerin vom Ivora-Tor

foreign_names.name: Purga celestial
foreign_names.text: Exilia el permanente negro o rojo objetivo.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Dicen que sólo los buenos mueren jóvenes. Obviamente, eres una excepción."
—Delrobah, clériga del Portal Ivora

foreign_names.name: Épuration céleste
foreign_names.text: Exilez le permanent noir ou rouge ciblé.
foreign_names.flavor:
« On dit que ce sont seulement les meilleurs qui partent les premiers. Selon toute évidence, vous êtes une des exceptions. »
—Delrobah, Clerc de Porte d'Ivora

foreign_names.name: Epurazione Celeste
foreign_names.text: Esilia un permanente nero o rosso bersaglio.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Dicono che solo i buoni muoiono giovani. Tu, naturalmente, sei un'eccezione."
—Delrobah, chierica di Castello Ivora

foreign_names.name: 天界の粛清
foreign_names.text: 黒か赤のパーマネント１つを対象とし、それを追放する。
foreign_names.flavor:
「早死にするのは善人ばかりとは言いますよね。 明らかに、あなたは例外のようですが。」
――イヴォラ城門の僧侶、デルロバ

foreign_names.name: Expurgo Celestial
foreign_names.text: Exile a permanente alvo preta ou vermelha.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Dizem que apenas os bons morrem jovem. Obviamente, você é uma exceção."
— Delrobah, clérigo do Portão de Ivora

foreign_names.name: Небесное Очищение
foreign_names.text: Изгоните целевой черный или красный перманент.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Говорят, только праведники умирают молодыми. Разумеется, вы — исключение».
— Делроба, служительница замка Айвора-Гейт

foreign_names.name: 天界涤净
foreign_names.text: 放逐目标黑色或红色永久物。
